title: # 428 - Jesus Trejo, Shane Torres, Dave Williamson, Ron the Bus Driver, Andrew Hobson & ME
description:
Today I talk to the “Hot Summer Nights Tour” crew. Jesus Trejo, Shane Torres, Dave Williamson, Ron “The Bus Driver” and my cousin Andrew talk about what it’s like to play drive in movie theaters, our favorite moments on tour, teaching Jesus to swim, and much more!

This podcast is brought to you by Radix Remedies. Go to http://www.radixremedies.com/bert and use the code “BERT” for 10% off all products.

This podcast is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcasted for your free visit.

This podcast is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code "Bert" at checkout to save 15%. 

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

This episode is brought to you by Policy Genius. In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at http://www.policygenius.com  

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
